entry.title: DevOps Journey (1) - Programming Language
entry.summary: First, I’m going to learn Python, and -hopefully- almost only Python. I want to apply all programming and computer science related principles in Python language. entry.content:
First, I’m going to learn Python, and -hopefully- almost only Python. I want to apply all programming and computer science related principles in Python language.

(In future, I think I need to learn functional programming, iterative programming, typed language things. I know Python has no ability to that)
